body:
Reported by est...@gmail.com, Jan 22, 2011
Put more filters in the card explorer window, stuff like creature type, mana cost and if is possible inside text words.

Example: If you type in the Text Search "Goblin" it will show any creature that is type Goblin, has Goblin in his name or has Goblin in his text.

Comment 1 by project member ubeefx, Jan 23, 2011
Rule text is not possible at the moment, the game has no text for each card.
Creature types and mana cost should be doable, but with current small card pool low priority.
Status: Accepted

Comment 2 by project member singularita, Jan 25, 2011
Part of the scripts used to help with card import is a script to download text of all existing cards. So adding text would be possible in two ways:

- use the script to add the card text in the cards.txt file automatically (though this may raise some copyright issues ...)
- integrate the functionality into magarena, so it will download card text in similar manner as it downloads the images.

I think I will implement the feature to download the card texts and then it would be possible to implement some search in the text ....
